description:
Course Description

  • Make money from your knowledge, make your money back and more!!
  • Your results by taking the course?
    • Learn how to publish your apps on the Google Play store!
    • Completion Certificate
    • How to make money from this knowledge
    • How to publish your future applications

Have you ever wondered how I can publish my own Android applications to the Google Play Store?

How do I go about it? What skills do I need? What is the process involved?

Well, the only information you need is in this course, and will show you how to publish your Android applications to the Google Play Store! If your looking to get into the hot area of app development or create an alternative income from your hobby - then this course is for you!

By very simply listening and following along with the videos. you will have your applications published on the Google Play Store and the knowledge to do it over and over again!

This course is no nonsense and in as little as an hour you to can have your application in the Google Play Store.

Just easy to follow steps for your next (or first) application.

What are the requirements?

  • Either have a Google Play Publisher account or think about getting one
What am I going to get from this course?
  • Over 15 lectures and 38.5 mins of content!
  • Learn the steps necessary to publish Android apps!
  • Use this lecture to trace their steps for re-publishing apps!
What is the target audience?
  • People who want to understand how to submit an Android app!
  • People who want to have the tools available on how to re-submit an app if it is their second
title: Android App Development: Publish Apps To Google Play Store
